titles.title: For the relief of the survivors of Michael T. Theodore, Jr., Joshua A. Sherbourne, and Zachary A. Nolen.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Disability Assistance and Memorial Affairs.

bill.summary: 3/11/2011--Introduced. Provides for the relief of the survivors of Michael T. Theodore, Jr., Joshua A. Sherbourne, and Zachary A. Nolen.
